title: The Herd-HOUR 1-Rockets, Lakers, Patriots
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR 1-Rockets, Lakers, Patriots
description:
Colin explains why the Rockets win of the Bucks isn't a big deal, why the Lakers are not a championship team, and why Cam Newton is in a bad situation.

Guest: 11 time NBA All-Star Chris Bosh

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
